2050-2000-glider base cost per kg.name: glider base cost per kg
2050-2000-glider base cost per kg.comment:
An approximate cost of the glider (chassis, cab, and accessories excluding the powertrain) for heavy-duty trucks can be derived by combining cost data from recent ICCT studies with mass data from teardown analyses. The European heavy-duty vehicle decarbonization pathways report (ICCT, 2023) estimates the direct manufacturing cost of the chassis for a long-haul tractor (VECTO group 5-LH) at about €28,750 per vehicle
. Complementarily, the US TCO of alternative powertrains report (ICCT, 2023), based on Ricardo Strategic Consulting teardown data, provides a base glider mass of approximately 10,439 lb (4,735 kg) for current Class 8 tractors, with future lightweight designs reaching ~3,915 kg
. Normalizing the European cost estimates by these mass figures yields an implied glider cost in the range of 6–7 €/kg, depending on assumed vehicle lightweighting. This integrated approach thus provides a first-order estimate of glider cost per unit mass, which is not reported directly in the reviewed sources.

An approximate cost of the glider (chassis, cab, and accessories excluding the powertrain) for heavy-duty trucks can be derived by combining cost data from recent ICCT studies with mass data from teardown analyses. The European heavy-duty vehicle decarbonization pathways report (ICCT, 2023) estimates the direct manufacturing cost of the chassis for a long-haul tractor (VECTO group 5-LH) at about €28,750 per vehicle
. Complementarily, the US TCO of alternative powertrains report (ICCT, 2023), based on Ricardo Strategic Consulting teardown data, provides a base glider mass of approximately 10,439 lb (4,735 kg) for current Class 8 tractors, with future lightweight designs reaching ~3,915 kg
. Normalizing the European cost estimates by these mass figures yields an implied glider cost in the range of 6–7 €/kg, depending on assumed vehicle lightweighting. This integrated approach thus provides a first-order estimate of glider cost per unit mass, which is not reported directly in the reviewed sources.
